metadata.title: CVE-2021-33558 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Boa 0.94.13 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation via a misconfiguration involving backup.html, preview.html,js/log.js, log.html, email.html, online-users.html, and config.js. NOTE:multiple third parties report that this is a site-specific issue becausethose files are not part of Boa.

criterions.comment: boa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
